import React from "react" import "./Product.css" import {useStateValue} from "../../StateProvider" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import StarIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Star" // import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Product(props) { const { productId, categoryId, productName, description, quantity, imageUrl, rating, comments, price, } = props const ProductId = productId let ProductName = productName let CategoryId = categoryId let Description = description let Quantity = quantity let ImageUrl = imageUrl let Rating = rating let Comments = comments let Price = price let Rating2 = Number(Rating) const [{basket}, dispatch] = useStateValue() const addToBasket = () => { // dispatch the item into the data layer dispatch({ type: "ADD_TO_BASKET", item: { ProductId: ProductId, ProductName: ProductName, ImageUrl: ImageUrl, Price: Price, Rating: Rating, }, }) } return (

{ProductName}

$ {Price}

{Array(Rating2) .fill() .map((star, index) => { return ðŸŒŸ })}

) } export default Product
